name: Adjectives and Monsters
description:
WebGL build currently not fuctioning- Please Download and Play

A prototype for a real-time card game I developed for a class. Adjectives and Monsters is all about buffing your monsters and weakening your enemies using the power of descriptive language.

This specific project will likely see no further development. I may explore this idea in a later project, but, as I had a short window to develop this, the back-end is an absolute mess. Balance is certainly a mess as well.

Download & Play Instructions:

1. Click Download

2. Extract Files

3. Run "Prototype 4.exe"

4. Enjoy
